meta.title: Pharma Analytics, Life Sciences & Computational Biology

header.title: Pharma Analytics, Life Sciences & Computational Biology
header.desc: Graphing and dashboards for bioinformatics, collaborative analytics, and the modern life sciences.

sections.title: Scientific-grade graphs and dashboard tools
sections.body: Plotly has unparalleled capability when it comes to importing data from MATLAB, R, Excel, and other formats popular in the life sciences. Create and work independently with different graph layers, combine them into composite graphs, and export for print or web publication in any image format.

sections.title: Monitoring sea turtle migrations with Plotly and MATLAB
sections.body: Project Leatherback analyzes data from sensors attached to migrating sea turtles in MATLAB, then publishes the results with Plotly.

sections.title: Dashboards for bioinformatics
sections.body: Plotly.js makes it easy to build scientific-grade dashboards in D3.js without JavaScript programming expertise.

quotes.author: - Chris Rivest, Lifecode CEO
quotes.desc: Lifecode's research team shares and visualizes data with Plotly's Python API. Plotly is emerging as the leading cloud platform for visualization in computational biology.
